notes: all species had large 'sails' on their backs
the latest surviving group of non-crocodilian crocodylomorphs
incl. diadectes = 'crosswise-biter' one of the first herbivorous tetrapods, one of the first fully terrestrial vertebrates to attain large size
Tapiridae, Brontotheriidae, Equidae, Chalicotheriidae, Rhinocerotidae, Paraceratheriidae
